definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)

sentences.english: So, combustible ice is how come from?
sentences.chinese: 那么，可燃冰是怎么来的呢？

sentences.english: All highly flammable bulk storage containers will be kept in the oil storage room.
sentences.chinese: 所有高可燃性散装贮存容器将被保存在石油储存室。

sentences.english: We already know that, Combustible ice is a common product of low temperature and high pressure.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经知道，可燃冰是低温与高压的共同产物。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a bus- based flammable gases monitor system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种总线式可燃性气体监测系统。

sentences.english: We have two incinerators that, uh, burn all the combustibles.
sentences.chinese: 我们有两个焚化炉，焚化所有的可燃物。

sentences.english: If protective walls or roofs are provided, they should be constructed of noncombustible materials.
sentences.chinese: 如果提供了保护墙或屋顶，它们应用不可燃材料建造。

sentences.english: A simple method is proposed in this paper for measuring the explosion of combustibles.
sentences.chinese: 为研究可燃物的爆炸特性提供了一种简易的测量方法。

sentences.english: D. If protective walls or roofs are provided, they should be constructed of noncombustible materials.
sentences.chinese: 如果提供了保护墙或屋顶，它们应用不可燃材料建造。

sentences.english: Woodmeal is of particular importance among combustible ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 在可燃成份中，木粉是特别重要的。

sentences.english: Formation of combustible and noxious fumes during thermal decomposition.
sentences.chinese: 热分解时会产生可燃有毒的气体。

sentences.english: Although NF3 is non-flammable , it will vigorously support combustion.
sentences.chinese: 尽管NF3是不可燃的，它会有力地支持燃烧。

sentences.english: The amount of flammable material that surrounds a fire is referred to as the fuel load .
sentences.chinese: 火周围的易燃物数量关系到可燃物负荷。

sentences.english: The first stroke draws the combustible mixture into the cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 第一行程把可燃混合气吸进气缸。

sentences.english: The detention of two American television journalists by North Korea injects another combustible element.
sentences.chinese: 被朝鲜拘留的两名美国电视记者是另一个可燃元素。

sentences.english: Oxidants are substances that support combustion and enhance the combustibility of other materials.
sentences.chinese: 氧化剂是支持燃烧和提高其它材料的可燃性的物质。

sentences.english: Flammable liquids in use should be properly stored in safety dispensing containers.
sentences.chinese: 使用中的可燃性液体须用安全的分装容器妥善储存。

definition: junk/items of no value/various bits and bobs
